name: iHeartRadio
0:
”Alexa, play z. one hundred”
”Alexa, play Stuff You Should Know podcast on iHeartRadio”
”Alexa, play country music on iHeartRadio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. h. r. song requestor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With iHeartRadio on Alexa, you can enjoy your favorite local radio stations, podcasts, and music -- all free! Listen to one of thousands of live radio stations nationwide, stream your favorite podcasts, and play music for any artist, mood, or activity. You can also ask for iHeartRadio exclusives like Hit Nation, iHeartCountry, and The Beat, or ask for a local radio station or podcast by name. Find the best in pop, country, rap, rock, news, talk, sports, and more! 

Remember to link your iHeartRadio account so that your listening is connected across all the platforms you enjoy iHeartRadio. And be sure to make iHeartRadio your default music, podcast, and artist/genre service so you don't have to say "on iHeartRadio" at every request. (To do this, head to the Alexa app. From the home screen, go to the More tab > Settings > Music & Podcasts > Default Services, and then choose iHeartRadio for all three category options.)
